text: Motion
Motion

(Managing the schedule for the training camp, replying to
emails...  Somehow managed to finish today's tasks...)
Whoa!?
...Juri?

Sorry...!
Didn't mean to startle you that much.

No, I'm the one who's sorry for shouting so loudly.
Totally caught me off guard.

I suddenly felt a chill down my spine...
Wait, is that juice?
Oh, it's a little something from the other day.
Would you have preferred coffee, perhaps?
No, no, I'll gladly take the juice.

...You look pretty tired though...
Are you okay?

Yeah, no need to worry.
I was just wrapped up in work until a moment ago.

Now that I've finished a phase,
I thought I'd relax a bit.

To be working even here...
That's tough...

It's not a big deal.
Everyone else is working much harder.

And don't say that too casually... If the Producer
gets worn out, we'll all be in trouble, you know?

Haha... It's kind of strange to be worried about
by you, Juri. But thank you. You're so kind.

What...?!
What are you saying, seriously...
